summary:
Oh No,,,not another Gold Crafting mod :p

This mod adds a Counterfeiting perk in the spechtree and rename the coin to Septim 
this make you able to melt down gold ingot to coin and coin to gold ingot 1=1 value.
this mod is an alternative for those who prefer not to use perks in the smithingtree.
descriptionHtml:
Oh No,,,not another Gold Crafting mod :p
Yes i know there is many of moneycrafting mods out there, i alone have already two other mods and many other have them too. no need to comment that.
======================================================
PLEASE HELP!
If anybody know how i can make those crafting recipes to be a crime please send me a message, it would be awesome to have a mod where you must hide to make gold to not be put in jail. 
======================================================
The idea of this mod is to make you able to laundry stolen money/gold and make the crafting a Crime you can be imprisoned for,
But i do not know if it is possible or how to do that yet.

This mod adds a Counterfeiting perk in the speechtree and rename the coin to Septim 
this make you able to melt down iron and corundum ingots to counterfeit coins. You can make gold ingots out of Septims and Counterfeited coins (50/50)
Counterfeited coins is Clutter, Can sell them if you got the perks to get the 1 gold value.
can not use Counterfeited coins as payment in shops.
Still working at to make Counterfeiting a Crime
this mod is an alternative for those who prefer not to use perks in the smithingtree.
author: KennyBall

files.name: Counterfeiting
files.changelogHtml:
updatet perk information, recipe to counterfeit coins is changed to iron and corundum ingots.
You can make gold ingots out of Septims and Counterfeited coins (50/50)
Counterfeited coins is Clutter, Can sell them if you got the perks to get the 1 gold value.
can not use Counterfeited coins as payment in shops.
Still working at to make Counterfeiting a Crime
